articles.author: David David
articles.title: Russian units near Ukraine moved into "attack positions," U.S. official says - CBS News
articles.description: Russia has moved some long-range artillery and rocket launchers into firing position, according to a U.S. official.
articles.content:
Russia has moved some long-range artillery and rocket launchers into firing position, threatening Ukraine, according to a U.S. official.
Some Russian units have left their assembly areas — the bumpe… [+2286 chars]

articles.title: Super Bowl 2022: Odell Beckham Jr.'s injury causes NFL stars to advocate for banning turf field in stadiums - CBS Sports
articles.description: Beckham's injury sparked a social media outburst amongst NFL players
articles.content: Super Bowl LVI on Sunday significantly changed after Rams wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. was lost for the game due to a knee injury after his leg was caught on the SoFi Stadium artificial turf. Beck… [+1899 chars]
